category: WHAT'S IN AN OLD TESTAMENT NAME?

search_results.title: Behind the Name: Meaning, origin and history of the name Abraham

search_results.snippet: Behind the Name: Meaning, origin and history of the name Abraham. This name may be viewed either as meaning "father of many" in Hebrew or else as a contraction of ABRAM (1) and  (hamon) "many, multitude". The biblical patriarch Abraham was originally named Abram but God changed his name (see Genesis 17:5).
